text: Take a look at the top of hair on that cutie pie! The co - host of E! ’ s Daily Pop Carissa Culiner is sharing the primary pictures of her new child son, Chase Jackson Culiner, with the sector. The pictures display the brand new mother doting on her bundled - up child boy. On Friday, Carissa and her husband of 2 years, Shanon Culiner, introduced that they would welcomed their first child on Nov. 30. The day after giving start, the host informed E! Information, “ Chase arrived closing evening at nine : 48p – 9lbs 13ounces, 23 inches and a complete head of hair! Either one of us are doing nice! ”
